name: Broken (BlkPython)
description:
This is our simple easy to play but hard to master titles called Broken. Inspired by the game flappybird. Here you have to help the Orb get through the randomly generated obstacles, to the end portal of each level.  There are over 20 levels to unlock, will you be able unlock them all?

+ Randomly Generated Obstacles

+ Over 20+ Levels to play and unlock

+ Local south African artists/Producers as well as other international artists/producers.

+ Appealing graphics

+ Addictive game play

+ Slow-Motion

This game is completely free and is mainly for your entertainment.

We are a non-profit organisation that strives to teach the South African youth fundamental coding, robotics and game development skills. We appreciate all the support we have received. We are proudly South African.

Feel free to see our website:

www.blkpython.co.za
